articles.title: Argentina 1-1 Chile: Lionel Messi on target in Copa America Group A opener - Sky Sports
articles.description: Lionel Messi scored a stunning free kick as Argentina were held to a  1-1  draw by Chile in their Copa America opener in Rio de Janeiro.
